I know I've defended the idea of a restart a lot, but I see what a 
sequel could do better. Actually, it makes keeping the tripreds a lot 
easier! =)
So, I think a sequel would be preferable over a restart in the end.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers@t... wrote:
> I totally agree.... We do need to start RPing better, and not grow 
> attached to our characters.  I can understand fighting for him, but 
> don't make it so he can't die.  I have the same situatin as rAuq 
> where as i would;ve had at least four characters dead without the 
> help of other RPGers.  I vote for a sequal.
